definitions.definition: To utter a loud, protracted, mournful sound or cry , as dogs and wolves often do.
To utter a sound expressive of pain or distress; to cry aloud and mournfully; to lament ; to wail .
To make a noise resembling the cry of a wild beast.
examples: They howled with laughter at the prank.

main_definition: To utter a loud, protracted, mournful sound or cry , as dogs and wolves often do.
secondary_definitions: To utter a sound expressive of pain or distress; to cry aloud and mournfully; to lament ; to wail .
To make a noise resembling the cry of a wild beast.
